title: 【學生宿舍】112學年住宿保證金暨113年暑期住宿保證金結算公告暨複查作業 【Student Dormitory】Announcement of 2023-2024 Student Dormitory and 2024 Summer Dormitory Deposit Refund
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 陳怡秀 - yishoue@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6212
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【學生宿舍】112學年住宿保證金暨113年暑期住宿保證金結算公告暨複查作業 【Student Dormitory】Announcement of 2023-2024 Student Dormitory and 2024 Summer Dormitory Deposit Refund
日期： Fri, 13 Sep 2024 08:36:50 +0800
附檔： 住宿保證金複查表Student_Dormitory_Accommodation_Guarantee_Application_Form0925.doc (44 KB)   
各位同學大家好：
1. 112學年住宿保證金暨113年暑期住宿保證金結算公告，請上網查詢。https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx
2. 同學如對112學年住宿保證金與113年暑期電費、檢查扣罰等保證金結算有疑慮，請於2024/09/22(日) 前填寫「保證金複查表」經宿舍管理員複查確認後交至生輔組辦理，如未按時提出或提出後查證無誤，將依本公佈結果辦理。
3. 有退費的同學請確認電子學習履歷裡，已填寫學生本人的郵局局號、帳號或銀行名稱、分行名稱和銀行帳號，以利退費作業之順遂。
業務承辦人：學務處生輔組   陳助理，聯絡電話：03-8906212
                                                   鍾助理，聯絡電話：03-8906217
您平安，學務處心安!

Dear All,

1. The results of the 2023-2024 Student Dormitory and 2024 Summer Dormitory Deposits have been announced. Please check it online by yourself. https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/DormStudent/Login.aspx
2. If you have any questions regarding the deposit deduction from electricity fees and penalty fees, please fill in the form of deposit reassessment and seek reconfirmation no later than 2024/09/22(sun) from the dorm manager before handing it in to the Office of Student Affairs and Student Living Services Division.
3. Students who will be refunded their deposits, please confirm that the student's post office, account or bank name, branch name and account number have been filled up on the e-portfolio website, to ensure the smooth operation of the refund process.

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact: Ms. Chung at 03-8906217

Your safety, OSA's delight!

Student Living Services Division
Office of Student Affairs
